QuestData.Title: Krav'ogra
QuestData.Description: Stonemaul has chieftain, and it has slavemaster. Today, we kill both.$b$bFirst, Slavemaster Ok'mok. Me fight in arenas since me your size. Me know cruelty. Slavemaster Ok'mok is cruelty.$b$bWant to be true gladiator? Go to Stonemaul Arena, bang challenge gong in center of arena, and face beasts of slavemaster.$b$bMaybe you make Ok'mok so mad he jump down himself to kill you. If he do, kill him instead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Slavemaster Ok'mok by using the Challenge Gong in Stonemaul Arena.
QuestData.RewardText: Me watch you from afar. Me like your fighting skills, show much promise.

Objectives.Objective: Slay Slavemaster Ok'mok in the Stonemaul Arena
